name: Linkuriboh
text:
1 Level 1 monster
When an opponent's monster declares an attack: You can Tribute this card; change the ATK of that opponent's monster to 0 until the end of this turn. If this card is in your GY (Quick Effect): You can Tribute 1 Level 1 monster; Special Summon this card. You can only use this effect of "Linkuriboh" once per turn.
